App Util module

app_util.send_new_placement_event(pos, event_code, process_planner, button_grid, process_message_tree, style_grid, initial_style_grid, part_stock_tree, solution_button_grid, tool_tip_text_grid)

Sends new pick event to ProcessPlanner instance of FunctionTestApp.

Parameters

  • pos¶ (Pos) – Node position of the motion event.

  • event_code¶ (int) – Type of motion event. See Motion Event Codes

  • process_planner¶ (ProcessPlanner) – Process planner instance of the function test app

  • process_message_tree¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Process message display view of the function test app

  • part_stock_tree¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Part stock display view of the function test app

  • button_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Grid array containing buttons.

  • style_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid to overwrite visualization configuration.

  • tool_tip_text_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid to overwrite tool tip texts.

  • solution_button_grid¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Button grid with solution layout visualization.

app_util.send_new_pick_event(part_id, process_planner, process_message_tree, part_stock_tree)

Sends new pick event to ProcessPlanner instance of FunctionTestApp.

Parameters

  • part_id¶ (int) – Part ID to pick.

  • process_planner¶ (ProcessPlanner) – Process planner instance of the function test app

  • process_message_tree¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Process message display view of the function test app

  • part_stock_tree¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Part stock display view of the function test app

app_util.undo_action(process_planner, button_grid, style_grid, part_stock_tree, tool_tip_text_grid, process_message_tree, solution_button_grid)

Undoes the last action by reverting to the previous process state.

Parameters

  • solution_button_grid¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Button grid with solution layout visualization.

  • process_message_tree¶ (ttk.Treeview) – Process message display.

  • part_stock_tree¶ – Part stock display.

  • button_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Grid array containing visualization button for the current process state.

  • process_planner¶ (ProcessPlanner) – The latest process planner.

  • style_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid to overwrite visualization configuration.

  • tool_tip_text_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid to overwrite tool tip texts.

app_util.update_button_grid(button_grid, process_state, style_grid, tool_tip_text_grid)

Updates buttons in button_grid after updating style_grid and tool_tip_text_grid. Shape of each array must match.

Parameters

  • button_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Grid array containing buttons.

  • process_state¶ (ProcessState) – Process state that was modified.

  • style_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid to overwrite visualization configuration.

  • tool_tip_text_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid to overwrite tool tip texts.

app_util.update_style_grid(process_state, style_grid)

Reads the process_planner.ProcessPlanner.motion_dict from the process planner and updates the visualization configuration of the style_grid`.

Parameters

  • process_state¶ (ProcessState) – Process state that was modified.

  • style_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – See style_grid

Returns

Style grid (numpy.ndarray) with modified visualization configuration.

app_util.get_style_from_construction_state(construction_state)

Evaluates which style configuration should used for the given parameter.

Parameters

construction_state¶ (ConstructionState) –

app_util.update_tool_tip_text_grid(process_state, tool_tip_text_grid)

Reads the MotionDict from the process state and updates each items attributes as string in the tool_tip_text_grid.

Parameters

  • process_state¶ (ProcessState) – Process state that was modified.

  • tool_tip_text_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – See tool_tip_text_grid

Returns

Tool tip text grid (numpy.ndarray) with modified texts.

app_util.get_construction_state_attributes_as_string(construction_state)
Reads variable names and values from ConstructionState and returns them

as a formatted string.

Parameters

construction_state¶ (construction_state.ConstructionState) – Construction state to read.

Returns

str

Updates buttons in button_grid after updating style_grid and tool_tip_text_grid. Shape of each array must match.

Parameters

  • solution_button_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Grid array containing buttons.

  • process_state¶ (ProcessState) –

  • style_grid¶ (numpy.ndarray) – Style grid with initial configuration.
